title: ClaimV1
description: A minimal falsifiable claim. Claims are the unit of provability in Sterling: each claim declares what it asserts, what would falsify it, and what artifacts are required to verify it.

falsifier.description: Description of what would falsify this claim (what a counterexample looks like).

required_artifacts.description: Content hashes or paths of artifacts required to verify this claim.

verifier_entrypoint.description: Path or identifier of the verification function/test (e.g., 'tests/lock/s1_m0_no_v1_deps.rs::kernel_source_has_no_v1_references').
